remarks: Membership in the set of continuous complex functions from ` A ` to ` B ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Oct-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Nov-2013.)
statement:
elcncf $p |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B C_ CC ) -> ( F e. ( A -cn-> B ) <-> ( F : A --> B /\ A. x e. A A. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. w e. A ( ( abs ` ( x - w ) ) < z -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` x ) - ( F ` w ) ) ) < y ) ) ) ) $.
$d A w x y z $.
$d B w x y z $.
$d F w x y z $.
